extends java.lang.Object
The menu for edit actions

    • unselectEditToolItmExcept

      public void unselectEditToolItmExcept​(int i)
      Unselects the check boxes of the elements in the array of items for actions to open an AddableEditTool except for the element at the specified index
      Parameters:
      i - the index

    • isEditToolItmSelected

      public boolean isEditToolItmSelected​(int i)
      Returns if the check box in an element in the array of items for actions to open an AddableEditTool is selected
      Parameters:
      i - the index of the array element
      Returns:
      true if selected, false otherwise

    • enableUndoRedoItms

      public void enableUndoRedoItms​(boolean isUndo, boolean isRedo)
      Enables or disables the items for und/redo actions. The specified booleans each are true to enable, false to disable
      Parameters:
      isUndo - the boolean for undo actions
      isRedo - the boolean for redo actions

    • enableCutCopyItms

      public void enableCutCopyItms​(boolean b)
      Enables or disables the items for actions to cut and copy text
      Parameters:
      b - true to enable, false to disable
